sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Cart.css"; function Cart({ cartitems, handleadd, handleremove, handleSubmit, contact }) { const [address, setAddress] = useState(""); const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); const handleAddress = () => { setCart([...cart, address]); setAddress(""); }; const totalPrice = cartitems.reduce( (price, item) => price + item.quantity * item.price, 0 ); return ( <>

Cart Items

{cartitems.length === 0 && (

More Shoping Please Click on Home Button

)}
setAddress(e.target.value)} value={address} />
{cartitems.map((item) => (

Item Name : {item.name}

Item Price : {item.quantity} X ${item.price}

Quantity : {item.quantity}

))}

Total Bill = ${totalPrice}

{cart.map((item, index) => { return

Address : {item}

; })}
Thanks for your submission.

We Will Contact You Soon.

); } export default Cart;
